Mother of Ants LAIR
UR UR 2UR 2UR 2UR 4 4 Legendary Creature - Cleric God Creature 3/4 https://www.instagram.com/p/DJl-PfLMMYY/?img_index=2 !tag<lairnumber> 1 !tag<lair> the hours !tag<lairauthor> kogane !designer Kogane
2 UR, Sacrifice a creature that dealt combat damage to an opponent this turn: Put Mother of Ants from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. At the beginning of each of your postcombat main phase, add {R} for each 2 life your opponents have lost this turn.
The Forge of Days LAIR
WR WR 2RRW 2RRW 2RRW 5 5 Legendary Creature - Elemental God Creature 3/5 https://www.instagram.com/p/DJhKc7ZMM1F/?img_index=1 !tag<lairnumber> 1 !tag<lair> the hours !tag<lairauthor> kogane !designer Kogane
2 Trample, haste Whenever The Forge of Days attacks, you may put a creature card you own in exile onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Its owner puts it on the bottom of their library at the beginning of the next end step.
The Moth LAIR
BG BG 3BG 3BG 3BG 5 5 Legendary Creature - Insect God Creature 3/4 https://www.instagram.com/p/DJhKc7ZMM1F/?img_index=2 !tag<lairnumber> 1 !tag<lair> the hours !tag<lairauthor> kogane !designer Kogane
2 Reach If you would draw a card, instead mill three cards. {1}: Return up to two target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your turn and only once each turn.
The Red Grail LAIR
BR BR 3BR 3BR 3BR 5 5 Legendary Creature - Vampire God Creature 2/5 https://www.instagram.com/p/DJl-PfLMMYY/?img_index=1 !tag<lairnumber> 1 !tag<lair> the hours !tag<lairauthor> kogane !designer Kogane
2 Lifelink Other Vampires you control get +2/+0. Creature tokens you control are Vampires in addition to their other types. Sacrifice a Vampire: The Red Grail deals 3 damage to any target. Activate only once during each of your turns.
The Watchman LAIR
WU WU 1WU 1WU 1WU 3 3 Legendary Creature - Human God Creature 2/3 https://www.instagram.com/p/DJhKc7ZMM1F/?img_index=3 !tag<lairnumber> 1 !tag<lair> the hours !tag<lairauthor> kogane !designer Kogane
2 Vigilance, ward {1} Whenever a card you own becomes foretold, put a +1/+1 counter on The Watchman. {T}: Scry a number of cards equal to The Watchman power, then draw a card. Activate only if you own a foretold card in exile.
The Thunderskin LAIR
WG WG 2GW 2GW 2GW 4 4 Legendary Creature - Human God Creature 2/4 https://www.instagram.com/p/DJl-PfLMMYY/?img_index=3 !tag<lairnumber> 1 !tag<lair> the hours !tag<lairauthor> kogane !designer Kogane
2 Lifelink Whenever The Thunderskin attacks, create an enchantment token named Heartbeat with “GW, Sacrifice this permanent: Return target card named The Thunderskin from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.”
